    (, ,)))

      (NNPS British))

        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP BBQ)))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ same) (NN way)))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP BBQ) (NNS meats))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBN smoked)
        (PP (IN over)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (JJ long) (NN period))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NN time)))))
        (PP (JJ such))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (JJ whole) (NN slab))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNP Pork) (NNP Collar))))
            (VP (VBZ becomes)
              (ADJP (RB so) (JJ tender)
                (CC and)
                (JJ juicy)
                (SBAR (IN that)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP it))
                    (VP (MD can)
                      (VP (VB be)
                        (VP (VBN shredded)
                          (PP (IN by)
                            (NP (NN hand))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

nsubjpass(smoked-4, meats-2)
auxpass(smoked-4, are-3)
root(ROOT-0, smoked-4)
prep(smoked-4, over-5)
det(period-8, a-6)
amod(period-8, long-7)
pobj(over-5, period-8)
prep(period-8, of-9)
pobj(of-9, time-10)
prep(smoked-4, such-11)
mark(tender-21, that-12)
det(slab-15, a-13)
amod(slab-15, whole-14)
nsubj(tender-21, slab-15)
prep(slab-15, of-16)
nn(Collar-18, Pork-17)
pobj(of-16, Collar-18)
cop(tender-21, becomes-19)
advmod(tender-21, so-20)
ccomp(smoked-4, tender-21)
cc(tender-21, and-22)
conj(tender-21, juicy-23)
mark(shredded-28, that-24)
nsubjpass(shredded-28, it-25)
aux(shredded-28, can-26)
auxpass(shredded-28, be-27)
ccomp(tender-21, shredded-28)
prep(shredded-28, by-29)
pobj(by-29, hand-30)

  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ slow) (NN smoking) (NN method))
    (ADVP (RB also))
    (VP (VBZ infuses)
      (NP (DT the) (NN meat))
      (PP (IN with)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (JJ wonderful) (NN smokey) (NN aroma))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (VP (VBG lacking)
                  (SBAR (IN if)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP it))
                      (VP (VBD was)
                        (VP (VBN cooked)
                          (PP (IN in)
                            (NP (DT a) (JJ conventional) (NN oven))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

            (NP (DT the) (NNP BBQ)))))

        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP US)))

          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB become)
              (NP (DT a) (JJ certified) (NNP BBQ) (NN judge)))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT That))
    (VP (VBZ means)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADJP (JJ tender) (RB enough)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB be)
                    (VP (VBN shreded)
                      (PP (IN by)
                        (NP (NN hand)))
                      (SBAR (RB after) (IN that)
                        (S
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT all))
                            (SBAR
                              (S
                                (NP (PRP you))
                                (VP (VBP have)
                                  (S
                                    (VP (TO to)
                                      (VP (VB do))))))))
                          (VP (VBZ is)
                            (S
                              (VP (TO to)
                                (VP (VB fill)
                                  (NP (PRP$ your) (NN bun))
                                  (PP (IN with)
                                    (NP (DT the) (JJ juicy) (NNS morsels))))))))))))))))))
    (, ,)))

xcomp(have-17, do-19)
